title: Episode 172 w/ Aries Spears
itunes:title: Episode 172 w/ Aries Spears
description:
N.O.R.E & DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. On this episode the champs sit down and chop it up with Actor & Stand Up Comedian Aries Spears! In this episode we talk about the current state of comedy, the goals for most comedians, his impact in the game on & off the stage, & more!
